author: Special Correspondent
text:
DMK leader M. Karunanidhi on Thursday released a video on mobile messaging platform WhatsApp extending his Pongal greetings.

“I am using this medium since I am not able to wish you personally,” he said in his message.

Beginning with a prelude of the song ‘Thai Pongalum Vandhathu’ scored by Ilayaraja for the film Mahanadhi , the video has Mr. Karunanidhi recalling various sports activities associated with Pongal.

“This will be uploaded in all social media and it has become viral in WhatsApp,” claimed N. Navin and S. Suresh, the web directors of Mr. Karunanidhi.

CM's message

After Chennai was flooded, Chief Minister Jayalalithaa also released an audio message explaining the steps taken by her government to provide relief to the people.
title: DMK chief greets people on WhatsApp
